newsitem.title: INDONESIA: Indonesian rupiah stabilises, sentiment mixed.
newsitem.headline: Indonesian rupiah stabilises, sentiment mixed.

text.p: Indonesia's rupiah stabilised against the dollar in calmer late trading on Friday after a volatile morning, but sentiment remained mixed, dealers said.
"It's a crazy day. The rates are like a yo-yo but we saw concerted local action against offshore players which seems to be successful for now," one Japanese bank dealer said.

He said domestic players appeared to have succesfully countered a moderate foreign attack and defended the rupiah well. "It's a good fight from Jakarta. We saw plenty of dollar selling from Jakarta. They absorbed Singapore shots well and made a good stance," one Singapore dealer said.
